code:
---
title: System Admin User Flow (Reorganized)
---

flowchart LR
    Admin(("System Admin"))

    subgraph Auth["Authentication"]
        direction TB
        Login["Log In"]
    end

    subgraph Restaurants["Restaurant Management"]
        direction TB
        ViewRestaurants["View All Restaurants"]
        CreateRestaurant["Create Restaurant"]
        EditRestaurant["Edit Restaurant"]
        DeleteRestaurant["Delete Restaurant"]
        ManageLayout["Manage Any Layout"]
    end

    subgraph Users["Cross-System User Management"]
        direction TB
        ViewAllUsers["View All Users"]
        CreateAnyUser["Create Any User Type"]
        EditAnyUser["Edit Any User"]
        DeleteUser["Delete User"]
        TransferUser["Transfer to Restaurant"]
        ForceReset["Force Password Reset"]
        AssignAnyRole["Assign Any Role"]
    end

    subgraph Sessions["Session Management"]
        direction TB
        ViewSessions["View Active Sessions"]
        TerminateSession["Terminate Session"]
        ForceLogout["Force Logout User"]
        CleanupSessions["Cleanup Expired"]
    end

    subgraph SystemOps["System Operations"]
        direction TB
        ViewAllData["View All Data"]
        SystemHealth["System Health Check"]
        AuditUser["Audit User Activity"]
    end

    Logout["Log Out"]

    %% Admin can access every functional branch
    Admin --> Login
    Admin --> ViewRestaurants
    Admin --> ViewAllUsers
    Admin --> ViewSessions
    Admin --> ViewAllData
    Admin --> SystemHealth
    Admin --> AuditUser
    Admin --> Logout

    %% Internal flows within each subgraph to indicate deeper actions
    ViewRestaurants --> CreateRestaurant
    ViewRestaurants --> EditRestaurant
    ViewRestaurants --> DeleteRestaurant
    ViewRestaurants --> ManageLayout

    ViewAllUsers --> CreateAnyUser
    ViewAllUsers --> EditAnyUser
    ViewAllUsers --> DeleteUser
    ViewAllUsers --> TransferUser
    ViewAllUsers --> ForceReset
    EditAnyUser --> AssignAnyRole

    ViewSessions --> TerminateSession
    ViewSessions --> ForceLogout
    ViewSessions --> CleanupSessions
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
repo_description: Resturant Reservation System built in Java
